statements: SELECT * FROM CompetencyAssessments;
SELECT competency_name, assessment_score FROM CompetencyAssessments WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT assessment_id, competency_name FROM CompetencyAssessments WHERE assessment_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM CompetencyAssessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(assessment_score) AS average_score FROM CompetencyAssessments WHERE competency_name LIKE '%communication%';
SELECT * FROM CompetencyAssessments WHERE assessment_score > 80 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT competency_name, AVG(assessment_score) AS avg_score FROM CompetencyAssessments GROUP BY competency_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT competency_name, COUNT(DISTINCT employee_id) AS num_employees FROM CompetencyAssessments GROUP BY competency_name ORDER BY num_employees DESC;
SELECT employee_id, MAX(assessment_score) AS max_score FROM CompetencyAssessments GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM CompetencyAssessments WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM competency_assessments;
SELECT competency_name, competency_score FROM competency_assessments WHERE competency_score > 80;
SELECT plan_description, target_completion_date FROM development_plans ORDER BY target_completion_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, competency_name FROM competency_assessments JOIN development_plans ON competency_assessments.employee_id = development_plans.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM development_plans WHERE target_completion_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM competency_assessments WHERE competency_name = 'Leadership' ORDER BY competency_score DESC;
SELECT employee_id, competency_name FROM competency_assessments WHERE employee_id = 1002;
SELECT * FROM development_plans WHERE target_completion_date >= '2022-06-30';
SELECT employee_id, competency_name, MAX(competency_score) AS max_score FROM competency_assessments GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT plan_id, employee_id, plan_description, target_completion_date FROM development_plans ORDER BY target_completion_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Competencies;
SELECT competency_name, competency_description FROM Competencies WHERE competency_id = 1;
SELECT competency_id, competency_name, competency_description FROM Competencies ORDER BY competency_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Assessments WHERE score > 80;
SELECT user_id, competency_id, start_date FROM DevelopmentPlans WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Competencies;
SELECT competency_name, competency_description FROM Competencies WHERE competency_id = 1;
SELECT assessment_id, user_id, competency_id, score, assessment_date FROM Assessments WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT plan_id, plan_description, start_date, end_date FROM DevelopmentPlans WHERE user_id = 5 AND status = 'active';

SELECT Assessments.assessment_id, Assessments.user_id, Assessments.competency_id, Competencies.competency_name FROM Assessments INNER JOIN Competencies ON Assessments.competency_id = Competencies.competency_id;
SELECT * FROM Competencies;
SELECT competency_name, competency_id FROM Competencies ORDER BY competency_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE competency_id = 2;
SELECT assessment_name, score FROM Assessments WHERE employee_id = 5 AND competency_id = 3;
SELECT employee_name, plan_name, target_completion_date FROM Employees e JOIN DevelopmentPlans dp ON e.employee_id = dp.employee_id WHERE dp.competency_id = 1 ORDER BY target_completion_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Competencies;
SELECT employee_name, competency_name FROM Employees JOIN Competencies ON Employees.competency_id = Competencies.competency_id;
SELECT assessment_name, score FROM Assessments WHERE score > 80;

SELECT employee_name, competency_name, target_completion_date FROM Employees JOIN DevelopmentPlans ON Employees.employee_id = DevelopmentPlans.employee_id JOIN Competencies ON Employees.competency_id = Competencies.competency_id;
SELECT * FROM Assessments ORDER BY score DESC, assessment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM Employees WHERE employee_department = 'IT';
SELECT plan_id, plan_description, plan_due_date FROM DevelopmentPlans ORDER BY plan_due_date DESC;
SELECT competency_name, competency_description FROM Competencies WHERE competency_id = 3;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_score FROM Assessments WHERE assessment_score > 80 ORDER BY assessment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE employee_department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, employee_email FROM Employees WHERE employee_department = 'Finance' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT competency_name, competency_description FROM Competencies WHERE competency_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_score FROM Assessments WHERE assessment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY assessment_score DESC;
SELECT employee_name, plan_description, plan_due_date FROM Employees JOIN DevelopmentPlans ON Employees.employee_id = DevelopmentPlans.employee_id WHERE plan_status = 'Pending';
